website_summaries.verdict: Well-liked brand that contains hyaluronic acid for a collagen boost.
pros: Unique peptide and hyaluronic acid booster gives lips a volumnized look
Moisturizes lips with vitamins A and E. Sponge applicator makes it easy to apply
cons: Has a strong scent, and not as lasting as other brands

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! It came with no box, no protective seal around the lid, and as you can see from the pictures it looks used. I will be returning . It’s worth it to spend five more dollars at a beauty supply store and get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Henrik Sten

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! Cannot live without it
customer_reviews.text: I naturally have larger lips - I am apprehensive of gloss usually. This gloss is incredible! its got great pigment and its the perfect accent. It is a nude pink .... not too shiny and doesn't get "gummy" I am never without a few tubes in hands bags or within arms reach!!
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Schiller

customer_reviews.title: The color may not be the same when reordered
customer_reviews.text: I love Buxom lip polish. It’s the only brand I use. It stays on even after eating and drinking. The only reason I took away a star is because the manufacturer is so inconsistent with its colors. I find a color that is perfect and when I buy it again it’s not even close. It happens on Sephora as well so it’s not that they’re selling a different batch to Amazon. The prices are the same except I get it faster with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I looove this lip plumper! If you've ever used a lip plumper before, then you're familiar with the pleasant (for me) tingle and the unpleasant taste, that's just a fact of lip plumpers. I purchased kristen and I love the natural color it adds and it stays on for hours. Typically I would never pay this much for a lip product, but my sister left an almost empty tube of this stuff in my bag, which I had to scrape the inside of the tube to get the last bit out 😂 Anyways, it was love at first try.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this once and my lips became extremely chapped and burned for days. I gave it to a friend thinking that maybe I was just allergic. Not the case. My friend also broke out with a really bad reaction to this product. It’s dangerous and I would not buy ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this!! ♡
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a person who usually gets lip stuff online, for fear of getting the wrong color..but I love this product! Would def reccomend (I got Hannah) ;)
customer_reviews.author: Renee J. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plump lips
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite lip gloss. It has a tingling sensation that is sorta like menthol. It makes your lips look a lot fuller and it's relatively similar to my natural lip color which I love.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but the tube it came in, as well as the applicator were broken. I paid $21 for a product that won’t even stay closed and the applicator that is hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Best lipgloss ever
customer_reviews.text: I have never really cared for lip anything besides CarMex lol, but I had gotten the sample in my Ipsy bag a few months back and had fallen in love with this brand. It’s beautiful and doesn’t dry your lips out like most. Definitely going to be my main one I always will wear!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Bottle showed up broken :(
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipgloss and buy it all the time but this time my bottle arrived damaged and I’m not gonna go through the trouble of mailing it back when it’s leaking like this. Would appreciate a new one. Other than this isolated incident, this is mt favorite lip gloss!
customer_reviews.author: BrinjatheNinja

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I received this lip gloss as part of my Christmas gift. It feels great, the wand glides easily on my lips, and it's not sticky. At first, I was sceptical to buy it online because I didn't want to spend that amount of money on lip gloss, or worst yet, a fake; however, I gave it a try, since I trust Amazon's return policy. I would take a picture with it on, but it maybe too sexy for me to post.
customer_reviews.author: Ans on the Prime

customer_reviews.title: taste (slightly sweet, fruity
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same Buxom Full-On Lip polish I have purchased before in Sandy color. I used to be a retailer of this line and have purchased MANY of these - this has a different color (darker than original), texture (more slick, not sticky), taste (slightly sweet, fruity, rather than having a bit of a mint), and even tingling sensation (very little tingling that is...). It's not a terrible gloss, but it isn't what the gloss is supposed to be. I bought two... and they're quite expensive.... ((kick myself)). Won't be using them. The only good thing is that the shipping was quick so you can find out you got duped within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I’ve never used many lip products, as I’m someone who doesn’t use much make up. But I’ve had thin lips my whole life and I decided I wanted to try something different with my look for once. I’m so glad I did! It really does give a more full look even on my very thin lips! The smell is fine and doesn’t bother me, although I’m not huge on it. I could do with a little less sparkle in this product also. Also the shade I got is a little to light pink for me.. I will go with a darker shade next time. Overall though, a great lip gloss and will purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity to this product caused irritation and lips chapped and peeled for 3 days after use.
customer_reviews.text: Liked color and feel of product but the next day my lips were extremely irritated and felt raw, then dried and peeled for a few days. I waited another week for them to be completely healed and tried it again with the same result. Obviously this stuff doesn't work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced tacky lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: It is a overhyped overpriced lip gloss that does absolutely nothing. You could created the illusion of larger lips with different color lipsticks (darker on the outside, lighter on the inside) far better than this thing. It is a super sparkly lip gloss which may not work too well with more mature lips. And I think it has cinnamon instead of mint. Because it triggers my allergies and gives me a headache. I would go with maybelline plumper please instead. It has mint, works better and is a fraction of the price. Unless you like throwing away $20. In which case feel free to send it to me instead.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lip plumping gloss, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and shine. I’ve had Buxom gloss before and saw it as an option with subscribe and save so thought I’d get a new tube. Hadn’t had one for a long time. Same good qualities I remember. This is a plumper so there’s a cold tingly sensation but I don’t mind that. This color LEAH is a light peach pink with small shimmers in gold hues.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  Plump at all!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to get this after reading the reviews. Not sure what porducts these reviewers are talking about. This product not only DID NOT plump my lips, it is very sticky!!!!! It has a nice cool minty feel to it , and I don't like the color at all. So it's a complete waste of $ . If you're looking for any plumping effect keep looking. The stickiness is annoying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Cita

customer_reviews.title: Minty, pretty, plumping, and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this particular product originally in an IPSY GLAM BAG and you never know what you'll get from them, but this was absolutely my favorite item and I've bought this product when I haven't bought anything else but one other item and that was a lotion that since then I've come to dislike the scent of. This lip product on the other hand is a clear favorite. Great color, great shine, long lasting, minty feeling and taste. Pretty perfect for me. I great hit. Definitely does plumps at least as far as I can tell. Looks good and feels good in both colors I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Azure Rose Basmadji

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to lipstick ever. SO PRETTY!
customer_reviews.text: I love Buxom Lipgloss. As a Drymouth sufferer it is the best product I have found combining beauty with moisture. Wish it was a tad longer wearing, but if I am wearing plain lipgloss I have to apply like crazy too, even my fave plain burts bees, so the problem probably isn't the Buxom. It looks gorgeous and has very little taste and smell which is a plus for me, and I no longer feel deprived or underdressed because I can't wear traditional lipstick. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: StampReadNapRepeat

customer_reviews.title: Princess - pretty shimmer medium pink with hints of plum
customer_reviews.text: Princess is a sheer shimmery mauve type color. It has a slight tingle from the plumping. It leaves a sheer pink tinge on the lips. The glitter doesn't leave your lips feeling gritty. I don't really buy it for the plumping action, I just like how pretty the Buxom glosses are. It plumps a little, but not anything like you did that one ill fated challenge from a few years ago or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Cypressina

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe i didnt know what to expect but its a little thick and sticky and i didnt like the feeling of it on my lips. I also had to keep reapplying for shine which is not what you expect from $20 lip gloss but again maybe i was looking for the wrong thing from this but it didnt plump my lips either. 😐
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Superb, price a little high
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t prefer color. Buxom in general is a good products but too expensive. You can’t get all of the bottom of the tube when close to end. It doesn’t reach
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, flavor and color of this lip gloss. I had gotten a sample and loved it so much I went searching for the full sized version. It makes my lips tingle, smells good and doesn’t taste like chemicals (no I’m not eating this!). This isn’t a long wearing lip gloss and doesn’t stain your lips. I tend to use it throughout the day when I have dry lips. I would have thought with all the usage that I’d be needing another one but mine is still more than half full. I need to buy some additional colors.
customer_reviews.author: Shariike

customer_reviews.title: Can't go without!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lipstick I will ever use. It's been at least 10 years that I have been using only Buxom. I love the way it makes my lips look and feel. My favorite color was Stella but it has been discontinued so I bought every last one of them I could find. I finally ran out so now I'm using Gabby.
customer_reviews.author: jenny abreu

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to tell what color you're getting, and I was not lucky
customer_reviews.text: I got "Starr" hoping for a brownish mauve. It's lavender with gold glitter, which is absolutely infantile, which I guess is appropriate with the cotton candy scent. However, the plumping action really works, so maybe I'll get another color sometime (perhaps there are descriptions other than the very misleading swatches) and hope it's better.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mulkey

customer_reviews.title: I FEEL SAUCY IN THIS! 💄
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is zingly tingly! and middle aged lines? WHAT lines?! I went for a bold color, Isabella and LOVE IT. I'm Scandinavian with a red headed fair complexion and Isabella is a LOVELY shade for my skin, it's buildable color, so this one shade is great for all day. I feel SAUCY in this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Knight

customer_reviews.title: Got compliments right away
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why someone reviewed that it was dangerous, that she had a reaction and gave it to a friend who also had a reaction. I am highly allergic to most skin products and although, there is a tingle when applied, I had no other reaction other than my lips looking fuller and prettier. And I am an older woman too. Highly recommend this product. I got compliments right away and even noticed people in the grocery store looking at me. At my age, I am usually invisible. :)
customer_reviews.author: mrsking

customer_reviews.title: I've ordered it several times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.text: love this product. it makes your lips plumper with a nice shine. it's not sticky or tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Guarnella

customer_reviews.title: Just lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of this gloss. It stays on for about an hour. It’s basically lip gloss with a Blistex mixed with it.
customer_reviews.author: machele

customer_reviews.title: ... lighter than it appears in the tube but that's perfect. Love the color
customer_reviews.text: It goes on lighter than it appears in the tube but that's perfect. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J. Palone

customer_reviews.title: No plump
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do a thing and don’t waste your money, all it did was make my lips tingle-no plumping whatsoever!! Keep your money cause this product is a waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Best gloss I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I'm not usually a gloss girl but get so many compliments on this. Long lasting, not sticky, great scent and very high gloss. I haven't noticed any lip plumping however, my lips do tingle after putting it on. I have very sensitive skin and haven't had any problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheechako

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, but doesn't plump.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this lip polish, but it's nothing more than expensive lip gloss. It doesn't even slightly plump my lips. Mine also came with an impossible cap that had to be almost destroyed in order to get it to unscrew. While I know I'll wear this, I regret spending the money on another lip-plumping failure. To date, I have yet to find one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: My go to gloss brand!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand however, I prefer the colors in Claire, Kimberly or Starr. I put it on in the morning and it lasts thru my work out. It stays on well, shines and moisturizes. Not sure if it really plumps though... you’ll need injections for that...😋
customer_reviews.author: AimeeD  :-)

customer_reviews.title: Hmm.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this brand. First of all the color is perfect for me. Secondly, I enjoy the “cool?” feeling it gives my lips. Third it is shiny and seems to last quite a while- even though eating. Having said all that, it didn’t plump my lips at all, as advertised. I’ll still wear it because of the color. But I wish it did what it was intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Life Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what they say.
customer_reviews.text: No "plumping" occurs. Just a little tingling. Disappointing. Colors are very minimal when applied. Best over a brighter lipstick if you want shine.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Not Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I noticed I got a few blisters on my lips around the time I started using this product. They stopped once I stopped using it. While I cannot completely confirm that the product is to blame, the timing was very...coincidental. I also was not a big fan of how sticky the product was. Sticky to the point of needing to put ones hair up to avoid having to constantly peel stray hairs off ones lips. Apart from these issues, the pleasant tingle. The color was a pleasant tint as well. Regarding the lip plumping element, I did not see any significant change in lip size.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: All time fav
customer_reviews.text: I love buxom lip plumper- it’s my all time fav. I was worried about this color. I wanted clear and this looked white in pics but I thought I’d try it. (Color is domonique) I LOVE it! It’s clear gloss with a gorgeous sparkle. The plumping aspect/feel is pleasant- not like experiencing angioedema discomfort with most other plumping brands. Buxom is the best.
customer_reviews.author: leadnurse

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product just a little spendy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Buxom lip plumper line! The flavor is nice, the tingling is gentle, not too much, has a nice plumping effect, I get asked ALL the time what lip gloss I use. Guys dig it too 😉 Its pretty expensive for lip gloss-hence the loss of 2 stars, otherwise wouldve given 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: costly
customer_reviews.text: this is too costly when it doesn't work at all for me
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wish I read through the reviews before buying based on google searches. Product does not work as advertised. May be the seller? There are some poor reviews of this sellers products. It does have a good color and feels cold on the lips, no stinging, but does NOT change the appearance of lip size at ALL. Returning
customer_reviews.author: L.O.

customer_reviews.title: WHAT????
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a buxom lip gloss, opened the buxom packaging and a “kylie” matte lipstick was inside😒 Not even a REAL Kylie lipstick. I happen to have the “same” color actually bought from the Kylie website and the color is different and the label is in English where as this one is not. Fake beauty products are DANGEROUS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market currently!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipgloss best on the market!! It’s so subtle but beautiful!! It’s so awesome I even wear it when I’m duty. The color is not the overpowering pink. It’s subtle and more a hint of color. I buy this lipgloss in bulk. It’s pricy - but worth it. I’m a repeating customer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money doesn't plump
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money it just burns your lips it doesn't plump them at all
customer_reviews.author: Linda Berg

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great value as it lasts for months. It doesn't have a scent or a taste. It is sticky but dries pretty fast leaving you with shiny lips!! I love the color and the tinging is mild so your lips get big.
customer_reviews.author: skyeeeo

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Dolly in the lip cream. Unfortunately it was misplaced, I never misplace anything especially makeup. So I decided to purchase Dolly in lip polish. It's very opaque. It's hydrating and looking lasting. I teach for it a few times a week. I live the minty tingle. It's not uncomfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jill STop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Can’t let it go
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this same lol gloss, same color for like 9 years now. Every time I consider switching I just can’t. I love it and it compliments everything. I wear it alone on casual days and then over liner colors when I want to look more dolled up. It’s my go to lip best friend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The BEST lipgloss EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I receieved a sample of this lip gloss "Dolly" in the mail and it quickly became my absolute favorite and go to gloss. It smells and taste good, lasts for a really long time, and looks beautiful & classy. I get so many compliments on it. Customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Gabby is darker than shown!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the color Gabby, it showed the color to be a light pink! Not at all what I ordered! I do not look good in darker shades, and Gabby is a dark maroon. I have previously purchased from Buxom and love the other colors I have.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good gloss
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Crystal shade which is a plum shade with blue sparkle/opalescence. Love the product, hate the applicator - it's a spatula type thing.
customer_reviews.author: Funny Nacho

customer_reviews.title: THE best lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip gloss! The color is a nice neutral and it has just enough shine to make it perfect for an "everyday" or "going out" look. Not to mention it leaves a lingering tingling sensation that feels great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on me
customer_reviews.text: Tried this several days and although it felt like something was happening (stinging) my lips stayed the same and never got puffy as they sate it does. Did not get a good value for my money
customer_reviews.author: Mia Girlie

customer_reviews.title: Tingle and plump
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss and my go to online while stores are closed Not long lasting but I know that (it’s a gloss), has no flavor yuk, and no real smell. Love it’s false sense of plumping, sheen and color
customer_reviews.author: gooberamk

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t plump lips even a little bit! Not at all what was advertised. Too expensive to not work!
customer_reviews.author: glacial speed

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute against my medium-dark AA skin. However, I’d assume the sugar shade would work well on most complexions. Great shimmer that’s not too glittery. Gives my lips a sexy, wet, lasting shine.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time ordered , this time does not want to dispense the product on the tip
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd time, I am really having a hard time getting the product out! A bit annoyed , takes 3 times to get this out. This has to be a defect. Trust me not happy, as it is a good product, and like the color. Big change from my first time I purchased. Like was it old ?
customer_reviews.author: Debra N.

customer_reviews.title: Lid not connected and not full tube
customer_reviews.text: The kid isn’t even attached and won’t stay on, the tube isn’t full and seems dried out you can see the gaps. Returning because there is liquid on the holder and not sure if it is sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: DWillet

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipgloss!
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is my go-to color! It is such a beautiful shade, and works on so many skin tones. I also love the tingle that plumps your lips. Its not overpowering like some other Plumping lip glosses.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Already used and half full
customer_reviews.text: This product had obviously been opened and already used. The lip gloss tube came only half full. Extremely disappointing and a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: It plumps and is a beautiful color! Would’ve given 5 stars if it wasn’t so glittery! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Meh. This did not do the job for me, its worth less than what you pay for it. I applaud them for trying. But for me, all it does it make my lips look shiny and it feels like mint on my lips. It's good lip gloss at least :/
customer_reviews.author: Kiti

customer_reviews.title: ᑭᖇETTY ᒪIGᕼT ᑭIᑎK ᑕOᒪOᖇ
customer_reviews.text: I OᖇᗪEᖇEᗪ KᗩYᒪᗩ. ITᔕ ᗩ ᔕᕼEEᖇ, ᔕᑭᗩᖇKIᒪY ᒪIGᕼT ᑭIᑎK ᑕOᒪOᖇ. IT ᔕTIᑎGᔕ ᗯᕼEᑎ ITᔕ ᗩᑭᑭᒪIEᗪ ᗷᑌT ᑎOT ᗷᗩᗪᒪY ᗩᑎᗪ IT ᗪOEᔕᑎT ᒪᗩᔕT ᒪOᑎG.
customer_reviews.author: Scotlandfog

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great lip gloss. My sister let me use hers and the color is so amazing that I had to have it. I’m not sure whether the plumping aspect of this is real or not, but it sure feels great. This instantly became my new favorite lip gloss!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best one of many other popular lip plumper brands
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted and was looking for in a lip plumper - this is my favorite brand I have purchased a few other very popular lip plumper gloss twice the price -this one was the best by far
customer_reviews.author: marshall shephard

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do anything for my lips except make them extremely sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great shiny color w/plumper
customer_reviews.text: Love the Zoe color. My gf tried mine & loved it, so I got one for her. It's got the tingley lip plumper in it & the color is gorgeous. I get super dark in the summer & pale as hell in the winter, but it looks good year round.
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Stays on great. Very sparkly. It’s also a bit sticky which is why it stays on. I felt some tingle on my lips but not a lot. It did plump them up a bit though.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It feels good but it doesn’t plump my lips at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Tully

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can wear my own color an then use this product over it to get a little plumb
customer_reviews.author: Ann Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: i LOVED this lip gloss. it is on the pricier end but its well worth it. i dont use it on a daily therefore i get my moneys worth. it does make you feel like you have plumped up lips. the quality of the formula is pretty great
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Best gloss I own
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is smooth, not sticky or tacky. The color is beautiful. I only wish it lasted longer, but you can’t have everything. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frank, FNP

customer_reviews.title: Sticky - Don't wear in a wind
customer_reviews.text: No better or worse than any others. The color is beautiful. Feels tingly. Sticky to touch and if you are in the wind with hair blowing it is a royal pain.
customer_reviews.author: Hiwyre

customer_reviews.title: I Love Buxom!
customer_reviews.text: BUXUM is the only lip gloss I go to, and have found where they have an awesome selection of lip color. I like a darker/mauve red. Very GLOSSY and SHINY. I got the Violet (mauve red) and the Dominique (clear coat). You won't be disappointed. Been buying this lip gloss the last 2 years and love it. Worth the 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this as just a pretty lip gloss and lasts forever but i don't see any plumping happening which in okay with its still my favorite lip gloss. The shade I got is dolly and its a nudeish purplish color
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect lipgloss!
customer_reviews.text: My go-to lipgloss! This color is so perfectly neutral and gives my lips that extra plump that they need. I’ve been wearing this for years and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tradewinds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything to your lips except make them shiny.
customer_reviews.text: This does not plump your lips what so ever. It basically a cheap lipgloss that burns for a little bit. Your better off just getting a cheaper lip gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Not all that plumping, but not bad for gloss. That being said, it doesn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda pricey
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss has a minty flavor. Very pretty color. I didn't feel like it plumped up my lips, tho. For the price I probably won't repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness....I’m in love with this lipgloss. No gross flavors, wears well, and lasts long (but not waterproof or smudge proof). This Clair color looks great! I’m now trying some of their other colors because this is now my go-to everyday lipgloss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color and it last long
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite colored lipgloss, you can actually feel the tingle as your lips plump. The color is amazing and very subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda C.

customer_reviews.title: Everyday glam
customer_reviews.text: My go- to lip gloss. Always makes my lips look good no matter what. My husband doesn’t like it and says it burns his lips but I think It feels nice and refreshing. Probably not great for sensitive skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Does not plump
customer_reviews.text: Meh....doesn't really plump, just has a cooling like menthol effect. Kinda sticky, too. DOLLY is a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: shirls

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy "BUXOM Jessica" but I think they stopped making that shade. "BUXOM Rachel" is sufficiently close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best lipgloss I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I got sample off Ipsy glam bag, now I cant live without it. Makes lips a little bigger but shine is awesome, it isn't sticky either
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Looks best when mixed with a darker color
customer_reviews.text: This item gives the illusion that your lips are plumper than normal. With this gloss it gives you a beautiful shine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Fave Gloss Ever
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this exact gloss for many years!! Love the plump factor, color, shine and longevity! Not sticky. No flavor or scent. I’ve tried others but always come back to Buxom Claire♥️
customer_reviews.author: chrissie navarro

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: The first one bought for myself and loved it. The second was a Christmas present for my mother. Very minty😋🥰Shiny, smooth application. I don’t mind pay $20 because it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Izola Camillie Bullock

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't last very long, I've had to re-apply basically every hour on the hour. But it's cute while it lasts and it's not sticky like most other glosses I've tried so I like it. I'll probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vincent

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light color. Love the tingle of this lip gloss. Has medium shine. Does not have the sticky feeling that most lip glosses do.
customer_reviews.author: teedee

customer_reviews.title: 😘
customer_reviews.text: I like it because you really feel the coolness of the plumping. I really don't think it plumps though. I like the fact that it's very tacky, so it makes it glossier.
customer_reviews.author: @m!@

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the plump?
customer_reviews.text: This lip polish felt very tingly for about one hour after applying so I was hoping that something was working but I unfortunately did not notice any difference in the plumpness of my lips. Oh well, back to lip liner.....
customer_reviews.author: Janice Brasier

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip polish!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Buxom for years and I love it. I bought it here because it’s the same price and color as in the stores, just don’t have to make a special trip to the mall.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY STICKY
customer_reviews.text: IT'S NOT VERY STICKY AT ALL, BUT YOU CAN FELL THE TINGLE WHEN YOU PUT IT ON. MEN COMPLIMENT IT MORE THAN MY OTHER COLORS!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Buxom has some of the better lip glosses you're always going to need to reapply it's a lip gloss not a liquid lipstick so you can't complain about that they are nice and I do like them
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nauer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Favorite lip gloss ever- I wish I could have all of them! I love how subtle the lip color is for every day wear and the minty feeling.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip gloss. It's a gorgeous shade. But you can find it cheaper at Ulta and Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best plumper ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love Buxom lip plump. Outstanding range of colors. Excellent staying power. Makes my lips look young and full. Do not need plastic surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ellen Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Best gloss ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lipgloss that I ever use! It never lasts long because I use it daily and I love the way it makes my lips look and feel! I wear it with or without make up!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip plumping product!  I introduced it to my friends and now they all use it!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip plumping product! I introduced it to my friends and now they all use it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carter

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: wish it lasted longer expensive for what you get but I do like this product
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

product_meta.title: Buxom Full-On Plumping Lip Polish
product_meta.description:
Color:DollyThis bestselling, plumping lip gloss delivers mesmerizing shine with a refreshing, tingly sensation. A unique peptide complex helps to plump your pout to new levels, while vitamins A and E provide lasting moisture for soft and luscious lips. Available in a vast range of shades and sparkly, pearlescent, or shimmering finishes that transform your pout in a single swipe. Wear it alone or layer this top coat over your favorite lip product to play up any shade.

BRAND STORY
Buxom believes in going big, being bold, and feeling sexy. Larger-than-life, sensorial beauty stimulates your senses and amplifies what you love most about yourself, so you can feel even sexier and more confident in your skin.
